Class BinaryLinearSearch

java.lang.Object
BinaryLinearSearch
public class BinaryLinearSearch extends Object
This class provides methods for generating random arrays, and performing both binary and linear searches.
Version:
2.2

    • generateRandomInts

      public int[] generateRandomInts()
      Generates and returns an array of 32 random integers between 10 and 100.
      Returns:
      An array of 32 random integers.

    • iterativeBinarySearch

      public int iterativeBinarySearch(int[] arr, int key)
      Performs an iterative binary search.
      Parameters:
      arr - The sorted array to be searched.
      key - The key to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The index of the key if found, -1 otherwise.

    • recursiveBinarySearch

      public int recursiveBinarySearch(int[] arr, int key)
      Performs a recursive binary search.
      Parameters:
      arr - The sorted array to be searched.
      key - The key to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The index of the key if found, -1 otherwise.

    • recursiveBinarySearch

      private int recursiveBinarySearch(int[] arr, int low, int high, int key)
      Performs a recursive binary search. To be called again and again till input is found by BinSearching in sorted array.
      Parameters:
      arr - The sorted array to be searched.
      low - The lower index of array.
      high - The higher index of array.
      key - The key to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The index of the key if found, -1 otherwise.

    • iterativeLinearSearch

      public int iterativeLinearSearch(int[] arr, int key)
      Performs an iterative linear search.
      Parameters:
      arr - The array to be searched.
      key - The key to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The index of the key if found, -1 otherwise.

    • recursiveLinearSearch

      public int recursiveLinearSearch(int[] arr, int size, int key)
      Performs a recursive linear search.
      Parameters:
      arr - The array to be searched.
      size - The size of the array.
      key - The key to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The index of the key if found, -1 otherwise.

    • recursiveLinearSearchHelper

      private int recursiveLinearSearchHelper(int[] arr, int index, int key)
      Recursive method to perform Linear Search. invoked till key is found. Else, prints 'key' not found
      Parameters:
      arr - The array to be searched.
      index - Element in the array.
      key - The key to be searched for OR the user input to search.
      Returns:
      The index of the key if found, -1 otherwise.
